issue.title: [CI][C++] Fix caching on Travis-CI builds
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-11406](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-11406). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
The ccache-based caching on Travis-CI currently doesn't work: the restored cache is always empty.

Fixing the caching setup should allow shortening wait queues.
